# Multi-Currency Pricing

Display prices and billing in multiple currencies. Support for USD, EUR, GBP, BRL initially. Currency conversion with transparent rates.

## Rationale
Listed in known gaps. Reduces friction for international users. Enables expansion into European and Brazilian markets. Complements internationalization effort.

## User Stories
- As a European user, I want to see prices in EUR so that I can easily understand costs
- As a Brazilian startup, I want to be billed in BRL so that I can avoid currency conversion fees

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Prices displayed in user's selected currency
- [ ] Support: USD, EUR, GBP, BRL
- [ ] Daily exchange rate updates
- [ ] Transparent conversion rate shown at checkout
- [ ] Billing in local currency where possible
